section.p: This class captures information about patient's level of understanding after education is given to the patient.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] levelOfUnderstanding with data type Code
Impression of how well the patient understood the education received. Example values include: Poor, Fair, Good, Group - no assessment, Refused, etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] levelOfUnderstanding with data type Code
